meta.name: description
meta.content: Calhoun Unit 40 is an educational organization for students 9 thru 12 in Hardin calhoun Illinois. It has a CES elementary school and CHS high school

meta.name: description
meta.content: Calhoun Unit (district) 40 includes calhoun high and calhoun elementary school which provides education for K-12 students.

meta.content: Calhoun Unit 40 District 40 Calhoun High Calhoun Elementary are dedicated to student growth. Located in Hardin, IL it is a public institution offering educational opportunities to students from K-12. Hardin Calhoun Warrior
